<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tandem Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=2915) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
<trait label="Tandem" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=395" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 70 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Requirements**
A creature is in your and your eidolon's reach.

</column>

---

You and your eidolon each attack, seamlessly targeting the same foe without interfering with each other's movements. Your eidolon makes a melee Strike, and then you make a melee Strike against the same creature. Both attacks count toward your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks have been made.
name: Tandem Strike
requirement: A creature is in your and your eidolon's reach.
